keyword: how many calories in a twinkie
title: How Many Calories in a Twinkie?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a twinkie, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Twinkie?
assumptions: Standard Hostess Twinkie (38 g serving), golden sponge cake with cream filling; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, and recipe changes; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Twinkie has about 150 kcal, mostly from carbs and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Twinkie?
What are the carbs in a Twinkie?
faqs.a: About 27 g total carbs, with 19 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Twinkie high in fat?
faqs.a: It has 5 g total fat, including 2.5 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in one Twinkie?
faqs.a: Roughly 2 g of protein per Twinkie.
Typically 0 mg cholesterol in a standard Twinkie.
